Class InventorySlotInterfaceTests

Namespace
InventorySystemTests
Assembly
InventorySystemTests.dll

Behaviour-level tests of the observable contract of IInventorySlot, driven exclusively through IInventory operations. Does not assume any internal mutators on the slot itself.
